title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Endpoint data loss prevention - App groups and granular app restriction policies
description:
,This feature enables admins to define endpoint DLP policies to lock specific apps for different activities and enables more granular restrictions for individual apps.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/dlp-configure-endpoint-settings?view=o365-worldwide#restricted-apps-and-app-groups
